changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE orders ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, placement_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, status VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, first_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, phone_number VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, delivery_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, shipping_option_id INTEGER, total_quantity INTEGER, total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2), total_amount_order DECIMAL(10, 2), FOREIGN KEY (shipping_option_id) REFERENCES shipping_options(id) ON DELETE SET NULL );
